mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id ,u.user_pw ,u.user_nickname ,ul.user_level_name FROM tb_user AS u INNER JOIN tb_user_level AS ul ON u.user_level_code = ul.user_level_code WHERE u.user_id = #{userId};

SELECT u.user_id ,u.user_pw ,u.user_name ,u.user_nickname ,SUBSTR(u.user_email,1,INSTR(u.user_email,'@')-1) AS userEmailId ,SUBSTR(u.user_email,INSTR(u.user_email,'@')+1) AS userEmailAddr ,SUBSTR(u.user_phone_number, 1, 3) AS userFirstPhoneNumber ,SUBSTR(u.user_phone_number, 4, 4) AS userMiddlePhoneNumber ,SUBSTR(u.user_phone_number,8, 4) AS userLastPhoneNumber ,u.user_addr_desc ,rs.region_sgg_code ,rs.region_sgg_name ,rsi.region_sido_code ,rsi.region_sido_name FROM tb_user AS u INNER JOIN tb_region_sgg AS rs ON u.region_sgg_code = rs.region_sgg_code INNER JOIN tb_region_sido AS rsi ON rs.region_sido_code = rsi.region_sido_code WHERE u.user_id = #{loginId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user ( user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_nickname, user_email, user_phone_number, region_sgg_code, user_addr_desc, user_create_date ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userNickName}, #{userEmail}, #{userPhoneNumber}, #{regionSggCode}, #{userAddrDesc}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT sido.region_sido_code ,sido.region_sido_name FROM tb_region_sido AS sido WHERE sido.region_sido_code NOT IN (#{regionSidoCode});
SELECT sido.region_sido_code ,sido.region_sido_name FROM tb_region_sido AS sido;
SELECT sgg.region_sgg_code ,sgg.region_sgg_name FROM tb_region_sgg AS sgg WHERE sgg.region_sido_code = #{project};
SELECT IF(COUNT(u.user_id)=1, 1, 0) FROM tb_user AS u WHERE u.user_id = #{userId};
SELECT IF(COUNT(u.user_nickname)=1, 1, 0) FROM tb_user AS u WHERE u.user_nickname = #{userNickName};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_login(login_code, user_id, login_date) VALUES ( sf_new_login_code(), #{loginId}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_login AS l SET l.logout_date = NOW() WHERE l.user_id = #{loginId} ORDER BY l.login_date DESC LIMIT 1;
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id ,u.user_create_date FROM tb_user AS u WHERE u.user_name = #{userName} AND u.user_email = #{userEmail} AND u.user_phone_number = #{userPhoneNumber};
